entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
